thread.title: Leicester treat Ben Chilwell for hand injury after being stunned by claims he was ‘too scared’ to take throw-ins at Millwall on Saturday
thread.title_full: Leicester treat Ben Chilwell for hand injury after being stunned by claims he was ‘too scared’ to take throw-ins at Millwall on Saturday

author: dfraser
title: Leicester treat Ben Chilwell for hand injury after being stunned by claims he was ‘too scared’ to take throw-ins at Millwall on Saturday
text:
EFL Chil out Leicester treat Ben Chilwell for hand injury after being stunned by claims he was ‘too scared’ to take throw-ins at Millwall on Saturday 
Lions forward Steve Morison had claimed 'hostile atmosphere' at The Den had affected Chilwell during the FA Cup clash Exclusive
